full_text: Scott Morrison, Australia’s prime minister, wrote in a post on Facebook that the company’s actions to “unfriend Australia” would only confirm worldwide concerns that big tech companies are above governments and the law  https://t.co/gYyeK3PP5g

localize.full_text: 澳大利亚总理斯科特-莫里森（Scott Morrison）在Facebook上发文称，该公司 "解除对澳大利亚的友情 "的行为只会证实全世界对大型科技公司凌驾于政府和法律之上的担忧https://t.co/gYyeK3PP5g。
澳大利亞總理斯科特-莫里森（Scott Morrison）在Facebook上發文稱，該公司 "解除對澳大利亞的友情 "的行爲只會證實全世界對大型科技公司凌駕於政府和法律之上的擔憂https://t.co/gYyeK3PP5g。
